commands.openSystemDetails: Open Connection Manager for SAP Systems
commands.quickpickPlaceholder: Select an SAP system to view details

confirmationPrompt.delete: Delete [{{- system}}]? Your Fiori application may not run locally anymore.
confirmationPrompt.overwrite: A connection already exists with name [{{- system}}]. Do you want to overwrite?

info.numServices: This SAP System [{{- system}}] returned {{v2}} OData V2 and {{v4}} OData V4 services.
info.serviceRequestCheckLogs: {{- url}} returned service data. Check the debug logs for the full metadata.

error.noConnectionsDefined: No connections defined in configuration file: {{- filePath}}
error.incompleteConfig: Connection configuration is incomplete. A URL is required.
error.connectionNotFound: Connection [{{- backendKey}}] not found in the secure store. Please ensure the system is saved correctly.
error.exportFailure: Failed to export connection information: {{- error}}.
error.connectionInfo: Error during processing of connection information: {{- error}}
error.updateFailure: Failed to update connection information: {{- error}}
error.noServices: This SAP system failed to return any services.

cert.urlValidation: The system URL is using {{certError}} security certificate.
cert.wrongHost: a hostname or IP address not matching the
cert.validationHelp: Click here for details on how to use a self-signed security certificate.
cert.gaPromptSubText: To fix this issue, follow Guided Answers steps.

error.launchAppGen: Failed to launch the SAP Fiori application generator for [{{- systemName}}].
error.catalogRequest: The V{{version}} request failed with error: {{error}}.
error.guidedAnswersCmd: Error executing command to open the Guided Answers extension: {{- error}}
error.viewConnectionDetails: Error executing command to view connection details.
error.testConnection: An error occurred when testing the connection: {{- error}}
error.systemInfoUpdate: Failed to add the system information to the backend system: {{- error}}
error.serviceRequest: An error occurred while requesting the service metadata: {{- error}}

debug.systemInfoRetrieved: Successfully retrieved the system ID '{{- systemId}}' and client '{{client}}' from '/sap/bc/adt/core/http/systeminformation'.
debug.systemInfoRetrievalFailure: Failed to retrieve system information from '/sap/bc/adt/core/http/systeminformation': {{- error}}

validation.provideUrl: Please provide a valid URL to test the connection.
validation.connectionNameExists: Connection name is already in use
validation.urlInvalid: The URL '{{- url}}' provided is invalid
